recipe.title: Bedouin Salsa
ingredients: 6 fresh serrano chiles, stemmed and chopped
instructions: Heat a comal or dry 12-inch heavy skillet (preferably cast-iron; not nonstick) over medium-low heat until hot. Cook garlic and jalapeños, turning with tongs occasionally, until blackened in spots, about 15 minutes. Cool slightly, about 15 minutes. Combine all ingredients except parsley in a food processor and finely chop. Add parsley and pulse a few more times.
